attributes.action: Convene a Board of Inquiry into the events surrounding the capture of Royal Navy personnel by Iranian forces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Royal Navy's prestige has suffered enormously because of this incident.  It is incumbent upon the Government to convene a Public Inquiry into the circumstances which led to the incident which should draw conclusions about the culpability or otherwise of the Secretary of State for Defence and others in the present Government, and of those officers of the Royal Navy in the chain of command, and make recommendations to ensure that such an episode is not repeated.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
